title: Hero Daddy
description: Ink has led a pretty charmed life. He has his family. His brothers at Iron Shadows. A thriving business. But there’s something missing. He’s ready to settle down, if only he could find the right girl. Someone he could pamper and protect. Dominate and discipline.A Little he could cherish.And then he meets Betsy. Sweet, shy Betsy. She might almost be too naïve and gentle for his world, but he can’t stop thinking about her.Fate had to her put her in his path…Right?
author: Laylah Roberts
